name: Hack The Phone
description:
!Recommendation!

!!!Play the game in fullscreen for the best visual experience!!!

Once here press the blue button(bottom-right corner) to go fullscreen.

Welcome to Hack The Phone!

In this small platformer game you control 2 viruses. Help them reach the settings to finish the level!

Controls: 

A / D - move LEFT / RIGHT

SPACE - JUMP

Links:

Backround: Hacker Wallpaper
